attributes.action: The bank of England has 'found' £240 BILLION to prop up FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS
attributes.additional_details: WE HAVE ALWAYS BEEN AN INDUSTRIAL COUNTRY - AND CAN BE AGAIN IF WE GET THE GOVERNMENT TO RELEASE THOSE FUNDS TO RESTART THE BUILDING OF HOUSES INSTEAD OF FOCUSING ON THE FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS - WHO CAUSED THIS IN THE FIRST PLACE.
attributes.background: Since the referendum, when that money could have kick started the house building industry which would provide training & work for thousands of builders, carpenters, electricians, plumbers - not to mention all the associated industries & suppliers.

rejection.details: The Bank of England is independent of the Government and Parliament.
